name: Tumblr
description:
Drive traffic to your website, raise brand awareness and increase your online sales. Reach the audience you care about most through the new Yahoo! Gemini mobile app.

With the Gemini mobile app, you can create, edit and preview the ad on the go. Track performance metrics, modify the budgets and bids with a simple tap. The app brings the popular Gemini advertising platform to your iPhone.

We will continue to add more features and you can help us prioritize! Send us your thoughts and ideas by tapping on the "Send Feedback" option.
